Title: A Spiral of Mist
Writer: Michele Prisco (book), Luciano Lucignani (screenplay), Fabio Mauri (screenplay), Roselyne Sesboue (screenplay), Lisa Morpurgo (screenplay), Eriprando Visconti (screenplay)
Actors: Marina Berti, Martine Brochard, Flavio Bucci, Carole Chauvet
Plot: The lovely Maria Teresa is unhappily married with the impotent lawyer Marcello. Maria Teresa's marriage is contrasted by the passionate Valeria, who is killed during a chase. Is Valeria's husband the murderer? Maria Teresa helps him...
